item.title: Week 27: Media Franchise Powerhouses
item.description: Revenue Category and Original Media media_franchises <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-07-02/media_franchises.csv") library(tidyverse) library(cowplot) library(rayshader) library(ggmosaic) media_franchises %>% summarytools::dfSummary() ## Data Frame Summary ## ## Dimensions: 370 x 7 ## Duplicates: 49 ## ## -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## No Variable Stats / Values Freqs (% of Valid) Graph Valid Missing ## ---- ------------------- --------------------------------- --------------------- ---------------------------------- -------- --------- ## 1 franchise 1. Neon Genesis Evangelion 9 ( 2.4%) 370 0 ## [character] 2. Spider-Man 9 ( 2.
